column5: Well I am off to the West Arm for a week of R&R and of course fishing   I will be leaving first thing in the morning after I hook the boat up...  I will be at Welcome Lodge Just past Lakair on Musky Island Rd. Look for the White Ford F150 and you will find me should you like to have a beer and shoot the carp..  I will be stopping by Lakair on the Friday for sure as me and Cliff's Wife (Carole) have a date.... dang Cliff your tagging along are'nt you... Note to self......... LOL!  Talk to you all Next Week!  Gerritt.   Ohhh then I am off to Killarny for a whack of days... Should be a hoot!   And then Ivanhoe PP  and then and then and then....  talk to you soon guys n gals and expect a ton of pic upon my return!
Sounds like a lot of work there Gerritt, Good luck out there man
Have a great trip, sounds like you'll be covering some decent water!  Look forward to the report when you return.  Play safe Tony
Have a great trip Gerritt, best of luck on the waters.  Enjoy and looking forward to the report and pics.
You deserve the rest Bud. Drive safely and see you next week.
Safe trip and looking forward to our "date"  LOL !!!    Enjoy!!!
That is quite the itinerary Gerritt, have a great summer, and see you in a few days.

Cya up there bud.Art and I will be at Lakair Monday afternoon.Swing by and we'll have a beer or call Kevin at the lodge with a number where I can reach you and we'll meet on the water.My cell dont work so well there or I'd have you call me.Drive safe! Joe
What? No Black Russians? Have a great time Gerritt
Well, sometimes the plannin', packin', the drivin, are the best part of an outing! Hope you have fun, and look fwd to the report.
Have fun Gerritt.  See you Friday  Joey
Have a safe drive Gerritt, see ya in a week.  Oh and save some fish for the rest of us would ya?  Maureen
Be safe, unwind, enjoy the sun and the fishing... Hope you make many memories....  Cheers  Jen
Just about out the door... and whats a vacation without the black russians!... it was the first bag I packed!  Gerritt.
Hope I'm not too late!  Have a wonderful and safe trip, looking forward to all those pictures when you return!
